item.title: Dynamic Linking Example
item.description: Following example covers API like dladdr, dlclose, dlerror, dlopen, dlsym and flags like RTLD_LAZY, RTLD_NOW, RTLD_GLOBAL, `RTLD_LOCAL, `RTLD_NODELETE`, `RTLD_NOLOAD`, RTLD_NEXT, RTLD_DEFAULT, etc. At First Sight, This Might Look Lengthy & Alien, But If You Spend 5 Min, You Might Get What You Looking For. I Struggle With Finding Dynamic Linking Example On Net When I Came Across Dynamic Linking Related Development. So I Wrote One Helping Post. flags.c We will create binary flags out of flags.
